content: --कारः {1} human effort or exertion, manly act, manliness, prowess (<ab>opp.</ab> दैव); एवं पुरुषकारेण विना दैवं न सिध्यति <ls>H. Pr. 32</ls>; दैवे पुरुषकारे च कर्मसिद्धिर्व्यवस्थिता <ls>Y. 1. 349</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> “god helps those who help themselves”; <ls>Pt. 5. 30</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 52.</ls> {2} manhood, virility.
